name: Extract Device Info
Registration Handler (fPort 1)
Upsert Device
query:
INSERT INTO devices (device_eui, device_name, device_type, firmware_version, registration)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5::jsonb)
ON CONFLICT (device_eui) DO UPDATE SET
    device_name = EXCLUDED.device_name,
    device_type = EXCLUDED.device_type,
    firmware_version = EXCLUDED.firmware_version,
    registration = EXCLUDED.registration,
    last_seen = NOW()
RETURNING device_eui

name: Parse & Store Fields
Delete Old Data
Insert Fields
Insert Controls
Insert Triggers
Upsert Viz Config
Notify UI
Telemetry Handler (fPort 2)
Store Telemetry
query: INSERT INTO telemetry (device_eui, data, rssi, snr) VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb, $3, $4) RETURNING id

name: Update Last Seen
query: UPDATE devices SET last_seen = NOW() WHERE device_eui = $1

name: Update Controls from Telemetry
Build Control Updates
Push to UI
Prepare Rules Query
Get User Rules
query:
SELECT r.*, c.current_state, c.mode, c.manual_until
FROM user_rules r
LEFT JOIN device_controls c ON r.device_eui = c.device_eui AND r.action_control = c.control_key
WHERE r.device_eui = $1 AND r.enabled = true

name: Evaluate Rules
Update Rule Triggered
query: UPDATE user_rules SET last_triggered = NOW() WHERE id = $1

name: Build Rule Downlink
Log Command
query:
INSERT INTO commands (device_eui, command_key, payload, initiated_by, status, sent_at)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3::jsonb, $4, $5, NOW())

name: State Change Handler (fPort 3)
Get Old State
query: SELECT current_state FROM device_controls WHERE device_eui = $1 AND control_key = $2

name: Insert State Change
Log State Change
query:
INSERT INTO state_changes (device_eui, control_key, old_state, new_state, reason, device_ts)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6)

name: Update Control
query:
UPDATE device_controls SET current_state = $1, last_change_at = NOW(), last_change_by = $2
WHERE device_eui = $3 AND control_key = $4

name: Push to UI
Command ACK Handler (fPort 4)
Update Command Status
query: UPDATE commands SET status = $1, acked_at = NOW() WHERE id = $2 AND device_eui = $3

name: Push to UI
Get Devices
query: SELECT device_eui as eui, device_name as name, device_type as type, last_seen as "lastSeen" FROM devices WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY last_seen DESC

name: Format Devices
Prepare Query
Get Fields + Viz
query:
SELECT 
    f.field_key as key,
    f.display_name as name,
    f.data_type as type,
    f.unit,
    f.category,
    f.min_value as min,
    f.max_value as max,
    f.enum_values,
    v.viz_type,
    v.gauge_style,
    v.chart_color,
    v.thresholds,
    v.is_visible,
    v.sort_order
FROM device_fields f
LEFT JOIN viz_config v ON f.device_eui = v.device_eui AND f.field_key = v.field_key
WHERE f.device_eui = $1
ORDER BY v.sort_order, f.field_key

name: Store Fields
Get Controls
query:
SELECT control_key as key, current_state as state, mode, manual_until, last_change_at, last_change_by
FROM device_controls WHERE device_eui = $1

name: Store Controls
Get Triggers
query:
SELECT trigger_key as key, display_name as name, field_key as field, operator as op, threshold as th, action_control as ctrl, action_state as st, enabled
FROM device_triggers WHERE device_eui = $1

name: Store Triggers
Get Latest Telemetry
query: SELECT data, rssi, snr, ts FROM telemetry WHERE device_eui = $1 ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1

name: Format Config
Build History Query
Format History
Set Manual Control
Update Control
query:
UPDATE device_controls SET current_state = $1, mode = $2, manual_until = $3, last_change_by = $4, last_change_at = NOW()
WHERE device_eui = $5 AND control_key = $6
RETURNING *

name: Build & Send Downlink
Log Command
query:
INSERT INTO commands (device_eui, command_key, payload, initiated_by, status, sent_at)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3::jsonb, $4, $5, NOW())

name: Notify UI
Clear Override
Set Auto Mode
query: UPDATE device_controls SET mode = $1, manual_until = NULL WHERE device_eui = $2 AND control_key = $3 RETURNING *

name: Notify UI
On Client Connect
Expire Manual Overrides
query:
UPDATE device_controls
SET mode = 'auto', manual_until = NULL
WHERE mode = 'manual' AND manual_until < NOW()
RETURNING device_eui, control_key, current_state

name: Notify UI
Prepare Rules Query
Get All Rules
query:
SELECT id, name, description, condition, action_control, action_state, priority, cooldown_seconds, enabled, last_triggered, created_at
FROM user_rules WHERE device_eui = $1 ORDER BY priority, created_at

name: Format Rules
Build Rule Upsert
Notify Rule Saved
Prepare Delete
Delete Rule
query: DELETE FROM user_rules WHERE id = $1 AND device_eui = $2

name: Notify Rule Deleted
Update Trigger
Update Trigger
query: UPDATE device_triggers SET enabled = $1 WHERE device_eui = $2 AND trigger_key = $3 RETURNING *
